text: int main ( ) { int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , t , n , i , j , k , m , m1 ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( k = 0 ; k < t ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { m = a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; if ( j - 1 < 0 ) m1 = m ; else m1 = a [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ; if ( m >= m1 ) a [ i ] [ j ] += m ; else a [ i ] [ j ] += m1 ; } } m = 0 ; for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] [ j ] > m ) m = a [ i ] [ j ] ; } printf ( "%d\n" , m ) ; } return 0 ; }
